remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口是用于访问托管类到从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. 此接口保留的 vtable 顺序类可以访问由非托管 COM 对象的成员。This interface preserves the vtable order of the class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.
